name: States Seminar
overview: An educational quiz game created by Roger Norton and published in Loadstar #086 in 1991. How well do you know about the fifty United States? Well, how about Canada and Down-under? A simple, ego-less and never-tiring computer quiz to help your student user about a subject with a wagering element to make learning more fun. The game includes 150 interesting facts about our 50 states. It will give you a question with 9 states to choose from. But before you see the list of states you get to bet any portion of your bankroll. If you are sure you know, you can bet your whole wad by inserting A for all. Each game starts you with $15 for 15 questions. But since we have subscribers in Canada, New Zealand and Australia you can choose which area to test at the beginning of the game. If you want to change the questions if isn't hard to do, just edit the us, ca or do (for down-under) files to enjoy a quiz of your own.
